info.title: Wildfitter
info.description: This is the new wildfitter api

get.description: You can use `/users` endpoint to retrieve a list of users, you can also use parameters to filter the list. Sort order is ignored when the `q` parameter is set, and instead results are sorted by match relevance.

parameters.name: profile-status
parameters.description: The status of the profile (online/offline/any) (online by default)

parameters.name: deleted
parameters.description: Include soft deleted profiles in the search (yes/no/any) (no by default)

parameters.name: location
parameters.description:
Filter by country or state. The Geoname ID of the GeoEntities separated by commas, or '0' to filter those without a location.
Also those values are possible 'midwest', 'south', 'east', 'west'

requestBody.description: The user object that will be added.

name.description: The Guidefitter Profile name of the brand

grid_enabled.description: Enable/disable the grid capabilities of that brand + show programs in cockpit (only admins)

with.description: The extra fields you want in the returned JSON

parameters.name: profileId
parameters.description: The profile Id to search by

parameters.name: brandId
parameters.description: The brand Id to search by

parameters.name: brandId
parameters.description: The brand Id to search by

requestBody.description: The brand object that will be updated.

join_message.description: The message displayed on the brand's employees signup page

insider_message.description: The message displayed on the brand's insiders signup page

url.description: Brand website URL (not GOP, general public URL)

corporate_domains.description: List of email domains for the brand (including @) (admins only)

corporate_domains_regex.description: A regexp to catch all variations of corporate domains (including @) (admins only)

gear_categories.description: An array of Gear Category IDs (admins only)

parent_brand.description: The Brand ID of the parent brand (admins only)

account_manager.description: The Profile ID of the GF admin that's managing this account (admins only)

anniversary.description: The ISO date of the brand's Grid anniversary (admins only)

grid_agreement.description: The file name of the Grid Agreement template already uploaded on guidefitterconfidential S3 bucket (admins only)

prostaff_status.description: Set status of the Pro Staff Program, 0=locked, 1=closed, 2=opened

prostaff_shop_status.description: Set magento shop status for the Pro Staff, 1=created, 2=opened (admins only)

prostaff_duration.description: Set status of the Pro Staff membership default duration, null=everlasting, 1=6m, 2=1y

prostaff_agreement.description: The file name of the Pro Staff Agreement template already uploaded on guidefitterconfidential S3 bucket

aim_status.description: Set status of the AIM Program, 0=locked, 1=closed, 2=opened

aim_shop_status.description: Set magento shop status for AIM, 1=created, 2=opened (admins only)

price_date.description: The date when pricing was last updated. If NULL it'll default to current date/time

inventory_date.description: The date when inventory was last updated. If NULL it'll default to current date/time.

name.description: The Brand Profile name (that'll be his Guidefitter URL)

avatar.description: The ID of the photo to use as profile avatar

cover.description: The ID of the photo to use as profile cover

notifications.description: The list of notifications IDs the brand is subscribed to

grid_enabled.description: Enable/disable the grid capabilities of that brand + show programs in cockpit (only admins)

with.description: The extra fields you want in the returned JSON

schema.description: To hard-delete the brand and all its related entities

get.description: You can use `/users` endpoint to retrieve a list of users, you can also use parameters to filter the list. Sort order is ignored when the `q` parameter is set, and instead results are sorted by match relevance.

schema.description: The extra fields you want in the returned JSON.

requestBody.description: The user object that will be added.

name.description: (Required) The user's Profile name (that'll be his Guidefitter URL)

guidefitter.description: The ID of an outfitter if the lead token comes from an outfitter claiming a business to answer the lead

token.description: An invitation token. User creating account comes form an invite.

insider_category.description: Flag a member as a potential Insider

with.description: The extra fields you want in the returned JSON

parameters.name: profileId
parameters.description: The Profile Id to search by

parameters.name: fbid
parameters.description: The Facebook Id to search by

parameters.name: magentoId
parameters.description: The Magento Id to search by

requestBody.description: The user object that will be updated.

name.description: (Required) The user's Profile name (that'll be his Guidefitter URL)

guidefitter.description: The ID of an outfitter if the lead token comes from an outfitter claiming a business to answer the lead

token.description: An invitation token. User creating account comes form an invite.

insider_category.description: Flag a member as a potential Insider

with.description: The extra fields you want in the returned JSON

schema.description: To hard-delete the user and all its related entities
The extra fields you want in the returned JSON

type.description: Descriminator: the type of entity (u: user, o: outfitter, b: brand, a: association, v: vendor, c: customer)

corporateDomains.description: The list of the brand's corporate email addresses domains

isGridEnabled.description: If TRUE, it means brand has Programs allowed to be enabled on the grid

isEmailEnough.description: If TRUE, it means the corporate domains are not enough to prove insider status, and documents must be also uploaded

insiderCategory.description: The Insider Category opened by being an employee of that brand

prostaffDuration.description:
Pro Staff membership default duration (1=6 months, 2=1 year)
ACL_PRIVATE

shippingAverage.description: Average number of days to ship an order

hash.description: Photo MD5 hash (to build path on CDN)

pro.description: Processed: is the photo processed and available on CDN?

commentCount.description: The number of comments on the photo

braggedOn.description: ISO date when the photo was bragged

deletedOn.description: The ISO date when the photo was soft deleted

name.description: Profile name (the Guidefitter URL of the profile)

canRename.description:
Can that profile name be changed still?
Admin can rename as much as they want though.
ACL_PRIVATE

updatedOn.description: ISO date of the last profile update

createdOn.description: ISO date when the profile was created

notifications.title: notifications
notifications.description:
The list of notifications the profile is subscribed to
ACL_PRIVATE
(with=REQ_PROFILE_NOTIFICATIONS)

unreadCount.description: Get the number of thread messages (conversations) not read. Must be authenticated.

deletedOn.description:
ISO date when the profile was soft-deleted
ACL_PRIVATE

type.description: Descriminator: the type of entity (u: user, o: outfitter, b: brand, a: association, v: vendor, c: customer)

unreadCount.description: Get the number of thread messages (conversations) not read. Must be authenticated.

isEmailVerified.description:
User email has been verified
ACL_PRIVATE

magentoId.description:
The magento ID of that user
ACL_PRIVATE

zendeskId.description:
The Zendesk ID of that user
ACL_PRIVATE

gop-channel.name: gop-channel
gop-channel.description: GOP Channel filter: shop, code, dealer

idp-channel.name: idp-channel
idp-channel.description: IDP Channel filter: shop, code, dealer

cnp-channel.name: cnp-channel
cnp-channel.description: CNP Channel filter: shop, code, dealer

oep-channel.name: oep-channel
oep-channel.description: OEP Channel filter: shop, code, dealer

mip-channel.name: mip-channel
mip-channel.description: MIP Channel filter: shop, code, dealer

frp-channel.name: frp-channel
frp-channel.description: FRP Channel filter: shop, code, dealer

frp-shop.name: frp-shop
frp-shop.description: RTP Channel filter: shop, code, dealer

ecp-channel.name: ecp-channel
ecp-channel.description: ECP Channel filter: shop, code, dealer

rtp-channel.name: rtp-channel
rtp-channel.description: RTP Channel filter: shop, code, dealer

categories.name: categories
categories.description: Gear categories IDs separated by commas

corporate-domain.name: corporate-domain
corporate-domain.description: The email domain of the company (including @)

has-domain.name: has-domain
has-domain.description: Filter brands depending if they have one or more corporate domains set

has-grid-access.name: has-grid-access
has-grid-access.description: Filter brands depending on their gris access status

has-profile-photo.name: has-profile-photo
has-profile-photo.description: Filter users who have a profile photo

has-claim.name: has-claim
has-claim.description: Filter users who claimed a business profile

insider-category.name: insider-category
insider-category.description: Filters users based on insider category (0=NONE, 1=PRO, 2=INDUSTRY, 3=MILITARY, 4=FIRST RESPONDER, 5=GOVERNMENT, 6=NGO)

phylum.name: phylum
phylum.description: Filter on phylum from active insider verification

is-verified-insider.name: is-verified-insider
is-verified-insider.description: Insider status. If TRUE filter only verified insiders, if FALSE only the flagged insiders.

is-dod-verified.name: is-dod-verified
is-dod-verified.description: If TRUE filter users with active verification verified through the DoD service.

profile-verification.name: profile-verification
profile-verification.description:
Filters users based on profile verification status
     *      (none=99,
     *      pending=1,
     *      accepted=2,
     *      refused=3,
     *      in progress=4,
     *      not yet in progress=5,
     *      expiring=6,
     *      expired=7,
     *      in grace period=8,
     *      out of grace period=9,
     *      in limbo=10,
     *      incomplete=11).

profile-verification-before.name: profile-verification-before
profile-verification-before.description: Filter profile verification BEFORE that date (which date depends of profile-verification filter)

profile-verification-after.name: profile-verification-after
profile-verification-after.description: If TRUE filter users with active verification verified through the DoD service.

subscriptions.name: subscriptions
subscriptions.description: Filter users based on their subscriptions to Insider Programs ('none', 'one', 'few', 'lots', 'pending')

orders.name: orders
orders.description: Filter users based on the number of orders ('none', 'one', 'few', 'lots')

brands.name: brands
brands.description: Filter users that are members of those brand programs.

schema.description: List of brand IDs separated by commas

is-manager.name: is-manager
is-manager.description: Filter users that manages a business or vendor profile

has-pending-document.name: has-pending-document
has-pending-document.description: Filter users who have a Profile Verification document not yet verified by admins

has-experience.name: has-experience
has-experience.description: Filter users who have or haven't a work experience

is-email-verified.name: is-email-verified
is-email-verified.description: Filter users who have their PERSONAL email verified or not (TRUE=verified, FALSE=unverified, NULL=ignored)

brag-app.name: brag-app
brag-app.description: Filter users that have installed the brag app (0=not brag app user, 1=brag app user, 11=iOS user, 12=Android user)

business-app.name: business-app
business-app.description: Filter users that have installed the business app (0=not business app user, 1=business app user, 11=iOS user, 12=Android user)

notifications.name: notifications
notifications.description: Filter users that are subscribed to any of the given notifications.

schema.description: List of notificaton IDs separated by commas

following.name: following
following.description: Filter users that are following these profiles.

schema.description: List of profile IDs separated by commas

is-admin.name: is-admin
is-admin.description: Filter users who are GF admins or not (TRUE=admin, FALSE=not admin, NULL=ignored).

is-prostaff.name: is-prostaff
is-prostaff.description: Filter users that are in pro staff of at least 1 brand.

is-activated-insider.name: is-activated-insider
is-activated-insider.description: Filter users that are activated insider for at least 1 brand.

has-review.name: has-review
has-review.description: Filter users that are author of at least 1 review (published or not).

has-names.name: has-names
has-names.description: Filter users depending if they have both first and last names.
